name: Next watering
func:
msg.payload = (msg.payload.WB2 - msg.payload.DW2).toFixed(2) + " kg";
return msg;

name: HTML email template
template:
{{#flow.ActiveAlerts.length}}
{{ActiveAlertsSize}} ACTIVE ALERTS:
{{#flow.ActiveAlerts}}
{{{.}}}
{{/flow.ActiveAlerts}}
{{/flow.ActiveAlerts.length}} {{#flow.RecoveredAlerts.length}}
{{RecoveredAlertsSize}} RECOVERED:
{{#flow.RecoveredAlerts}}
{{{.}}}
{{/flow.RecoveredAlerts}}
{{/flow.RecoveredAlerts.length}}
{{{payload}}}

name: Format Alerts
Count Array size / Set email title
func:
msg.topic = "GrowBox report"; //Email title
flow.set("SendEmail",false); //Reset email sending flag
msg.ActiveAlertsSize = flow.get('ActiveAlerts').length;  //Count active alerts array size
msg.RecoveredAlertsSize = flow.get('RecoveredAlerts').length; //Count resolved alerts array size



return msg;

name: Alerts template
Next watering
func:
msg.payload = (msg.payload.WB1 - msg.payload.DW1).toFixed(2) + " kg";
return msg;

name: Format time
func:
msg.payload = parseInt(msg.payload.toString().slice(0, 2), 10);
return msg;

name: Format time
func:
msg.payload = parseInt(msg.payload.toString().slice(3, 5), 10); // Last two characters as minute
return msg;

name: Format time
func:
msg.payload = parseInt(msg.payload.toString().slice(0, 2), 10);
return msg;

name: Format time
func:
msg.payload = parseInt(msg.payload.toString().slice(3, 5), 10); // Last two characters as minute
return msg;

name: Format time
func:
msg.payload = parseInt(msg.payload.toString().slice(3, 5), 10); // Last two characters as minute
return msg;

name: Format time
func:
msg.payload = parseInt(msg.payload.toString().slice(0, 2), 10);
return msg;
